name: DescriptionsTest
description: A comprehensive test schema to verify that descriptions are properly emitted in the generated Markdown documentation for all schema elements including objects, properties, nested structures, definitions, and choice types.

simpleString.description: A simple string field with a description explaining its purpose and expected content.

numberWithDescription.description: An integer field that demonstrates how numeric type descriptions are rendered in the output.

nestedObject.name: NestedDetails
nestedObject.description: A nested object type that contains additional fields, testing description rendering for nested structures.

nestedField1.description: First field in the nested object, verifying nested property descriptions.

nestedField2.description: Second field in the nested object, demonstrating multi-level description support.

arrayField.description: An array field containing string elements, testing how collection descriptions are documented.

items.description: Individual string items within the array collection.

mapField.description: A map field with string keys and integer values, verifying map type description rendering.

values.description: Integer values stored in the map, each associated with a string key.

choiceField.name: DataChoice
choiceField.description: A choice type (union) that allows selection between different data representations.

referencedType.description: A reference to a defined type, testing how referenced type descriptions are handled.

ContactInfo.description: Contact information structure defined in the definitions section, testing description rendering for reusable type definitions.

email.description: Email address of the contact, following standard email format.

phone.description: Phone number of the contact, which may include country code and formatting.

StructuredInfo.description: A structured data type with multiple fields, demonstrating complex definition descriptions.

id.description: Unique identifier for this structured information record.

value.description: Numeric value associated with this record, using double precision.

metadata.description: Additional metadata as a nested inline object.

created.description: Timestamp when this record was created.

source.description: Source system or component that created this record.

StatusType.name: Status
StatusType.description: A choice type defined in definitions, representing various status states with descriptions.

active.description: Active status indicating the entity is currently operational.

inactive.description: Inactive status indicating the entity is not currently operational.

pending.description: Pending status indicating the entity is awaiting activation or processing.
